metadata.Title: CVE-2016-9962 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
RunC allowed additional container processes via 'runc exec' to be ptracedby the pid 1 of the container.  This allows the main processes of thecontainer, if running as root, to gain access to file-descriptors of thesenew processes during the initialization and can lead to container escapesor modification of runC state before the process is fully placed inside thecontainer.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-9962` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

runc - 1.0.0~rc2+docker1.13.1-0ubuntu1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

docker.io - 1.13.1-0ubuntu4
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: runc package in esm-apps/bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.0.0~rc2+docker1.13.1-0ubuntu1').
docker.io package in esm-apps/bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.13.1-0ubuntu4').
